attributes.action: congratulate Northern Ireland's David Healy on his record breaking goal tally during his country's European Championship 2008 qualifying matches and urges the British public to support his inclusion in the finalists for the BBC's Sports Personality Of The Year Awards 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition highlights the record breaking achievement of Northern Ireland's David Healy during the Euro 2008 qualifying stages, when he scored 13 goals (at the time of writing), one more than the former record holder Davor Suker of Croatia. It also urges the PM to support calls for David Healy to be included in the finalists for the BBC's Sports Personality Of The Year Awards 2007.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
